headings.usage: All headings (h1-h6), buttons, and score numbers

body.usage: Paragraphs, inputs, labels, and game descriptions

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:opsz,wght@9..40,400;500;700&family=Nunito:wght@600;700;800&display=swap');

layout_strategy.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen bg-background flex flex-col
layout_strategy.spacing: Generous padding (p-6, p-8). Use gap-6 for vertical stacks.
layout_strategy.corners: Rounded-3xl for cards, Rounded-full for buttons and inputs.

inputs.style: rounded-full border-2 border-input bg-white px-6 py-6 text-lg focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:border-primary transition-all

images.description: Abstract soft pastel geometric shapes for landing page background (use with overlay)
Playful 3D abstract shapes for empty states or success screens

visual_assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with rounded stroke endings. Recommended: Swords (Duel), BookOpen (Vocab), Trophy (Score), Clock (Timer), User (Profile).

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients. Stick to solid pastel colors.
Ensure text contrast is sufficient. Use dark grey text on pastel backgrounds.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Mobile-first design is critical. Ensure touch targets are large (min 44px).
Use 'framer-motion' for the scoreboard updates and turn transitions if possible, otherwise CSS transitions.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update /app/frontend/src/index.css with the provided HSL variables and Google Fonts import.
2. Update /app/frontend/tailwind.config.js to extend the theme with the new font families (Nunito, DM Sans).
3. Create a 'Layout' component that centers content in a mobile-friendly container (max-w-md).
4. Use the 'hero_background' image for the Landing Page with a white/90 overlay to ensure text readability.
5. Implement the Game Board using the 'cards' style defined above.
6. Ensure the 'Challenge Mode' timer is prominent and uses the 'destructive' color when time is running low.
